page.title: 04Church, Adbaston
page.content: St. Michael and All Angels Church dates from the 12th century. The building's fabric is in excellent condition. Adbaston is now a member of the United Benefice of Croxton with Broughton and Adbaston with the Rev.W. E. Foster M.A. as its first vicar. There are 14 members of the P.C.C. and 57 names on the Electoral Roll. There is an active Mothers' Union branch and a lively Sunday School attended by 30 children. The church supports charities at home and abroad, and educates a girl in Lesotho. Services are not very well attended, except on special Festivals. 2 C.of E. sevices are held each month in Offley Hay Village Hall.
